content.section: Machine Gun is a tier 2 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 15, and at tier 3, can be upgraded into "Destroyer", "Gunner" or "Shotgun". At level 45 it can upgrade straight into "Sprayer".

- Avoid Snipers, good drone players and very high frontal DPS tanks.
- Attack lower frontal DPS tanks, bullet spammers, Trappers and rammers.
- Jittering your cursor slightly to where you're aiming spreads the bullets more, making them harder to dodge.
- Use your recoil to boost towards tanks to attack and away from attacking tanks as Movement Speed is necessary, be careful when doing this as they are vulnerable to the defender and other attackers.

- In one of the oldest versions, Machine Gun and Sniper were the only tanks that used to be able to upgrade into themselves, this however had no added benefits.
- Machine Gun was nerfed after the Sprayer was released.
- Machine Gun is the fastest Tier 2 tank.
